Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals have won four out of their last five games, including a 5-0 victory over the New York Yankees.
The New York Yankees have been dominant at home, with a 10-4 win against the Royals in their previous meeting.
Cole Ragans has a record of more than 200 strikeouts and a low WHIP, while Luis Gil has an ERA of 3.24.
The Royals have shown resilience and the ability to keep games low-scoring, with the total going UNDER in 5 of their last 6 games.
